hints.content:
Every bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Which bill matches the image?

Let's label the value of bill.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/80167e7747b5903bde5ad773cdba4675f3fb9a03.png)

$\underbrace{\blueE{\$1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ one dollar bill}}}  + \underbrace{\purpleD{\$5} + \purpleD{\$5}}_{\purpleD{2}{\text{ five dollar bills}}}+ \underbrace{\maroonD{\$20}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ twenty dollar bill}}}$

Now, let's add our five dollar bills first: $\purpleD{\$5} + \purpleD{\$5}= \purpleD{\$10}$

$\underbrace{\blueE{\$1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ one dollar bill}}}  + \underbrace{\purpleD{\$10}}_{\purpleD{2}{\text{ five dollar bills}}}+ \underbrace{\maroonD{\$20}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ twenty dollar bill}}}$

Last, let's add the values of all the sets of bills.

$\underbrace{\blueE{\$1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ one dollar bill}}}  + \underbrace{\purpleD{\$10}}_{\purpleD{2}{\text{ five dollar bills}}}+ \underbrace{\maroonD{\$20}}_{\maroonD{1}{\text{ twenty dollar bill}}} =\$31$

question.content:
**What is the total value of the bills below?**
 
![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/80167e7747b5903bde5ad773cdba4675f3fb9a03.png)
